description: “According to my sources, this thing is going to go for way north of $90 a share,” said Andrew Ross Sorkin, adding pressure on CBS and Viacom to merge.
title: AT&T in Talks With Time Warner
title_page: AT&T in Talks With Time Warner - Video - NYTimes.com
text: “According to my sources, this thing is going to go for way north of $90 a share,” said Andrew Ross Sorkin, adding pressure on CBS and Viacom to merge.
